title: GenAI Engineering Insights
blurb: Weekly insights on implementing GenAI and LLMs in production environments
description: A comprehensive weekly newsletter covering practical GenAI implementation strategies, LLM integration patterns, and real-world case studies from enterprise environments. Features hands-on tutorials, performance optimization techniques, and lessons learned from deploying AI-powered solutions at scale.

title: Cross-Functional Leadership
blurb: Strategies for leading technical programs across multiple teams and stakeholders
description: Bi-weekly publication focused on cross-functional program leadership in tech organizations. Covers roadmap planning, risk management, stakeholder alignment, and data-driven decision making. Includes real examples from managing multi-million dollar technical initiatives.

title: Modern Web Architecture
blurb: Deep dives into Ruby on Rails, React, and modern web development patterns
description: Monthly technical newsletter exploring modern web development with Ruby on Rails, React, and cloud-native technologies. Features architecture patterns, performance optimization, and migration strategies from legacy systems to modern stacks.

title: AI Tools & Automation
blurb: Practical guides for integrating AI tools into development workflows
description: Weekly newsletter focused on practical AI tool integration for developers. Covers code review automation, CI/CD enhancements, and developer productivity improvements through AI. Includes hands-on workshops and implementation guides.
